page.title: 14Trade Shopping
page.content: {Victoria}"Come on you two." "We're coming" Sometimes when we get home Mam has forgetten something. "Oh!Victoria!Would you like to go up to the shop?" "Oh Mam!What have you forgotten this time?" "The milk." "But I do not want to." "OK.No cereal tonight." "OK.I'll go up to get your milk." {Shopping Survey} {29}families told us about their shopping. Which shop do you use most? {12}Hintons Alnwick {6}Walter Willsons Alnwick {8}Spar Shilbottle {1}Liptons Alnwick Do you buy from delivery vans? {14}Yes {12}No {3}Sometimes
